            <tei-zone points="1735,3210 1778,3215 615,3215 832,3210" id="eSc_textblock_e5c888ad" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>

    </tei-facsimile>
    <tei-text data-origname="text">
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_5574baf5" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Auograph Piano</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Is the
            <tei-seg ana="#soulfulness" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                Living Soul of the Artist
            </tei-seg>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_674c2b38" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>It has the living touch which differentiates the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>from every other piano playing device in the world.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-seg ana="#exact_reproduction" type="topic" resp="#np" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="resp type ana">
                So accurately does the Welte reproduce each note-each delicate
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>shade of contrast-and the individuality of the player, that famous critics
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>declare it impossible to believe that the artist is not actually playing.
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-persName data-origname="persName">Walter Damrosch</tei-persName> says:
            <tei-quote data-origname="quote">
                "The Welte is without a doubt
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the
                <tei-seg ana="#technical_invention" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                    most remarkable musical invention of our age.
                </tei-seg>"
            </tei-quote>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>To know the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon Autograph Piano</tei-name> you must hear
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>its reproductions of the actual playing of such artists as
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118986724" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">
                Ignace J.
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Paderewski,
            </tei-persName>
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/11918625X" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Josef Hofmann,</tei-persName>
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118953915" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Teresa Carreno</tei-persName>
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/116014490" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Vladimir de Pach-<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>mann</tei-persName>
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/116204400" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Fannie Bloomfield-Zeisler</tei-persName>
            and others.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Demostrations daily at our studio
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Welte-Mignon Autograph Piano Co.</tei-orgName>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-address data-origname="address">273 Fifth Avenue, Opposite the Holland House</tei-address>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Steinway Piano</tei-name> Incorporated in the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_86c963f8" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs" data-empty=""/>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_82fe31e2" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs" data-empty=""/>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_4384fb1b" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs" data-empty=""/>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_2d107f1c" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs" data-empty=""/>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_734283b7" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs" data-empty=""/>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_e5c888ad" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs" data-empty=""/>
    </tei-text>
